ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Overthere faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ouch!  Not a good idea.  I have heard that many things in the outpost can see invis, I think its because half the NPC s in the outpost are undead and you
ygData.messageBody:
>Crap ah well.
>I get invis at 8. Maybe I'll try to sneak into town and see what my
>faction is....I might be kos to guards but not necessarily all of
>the npcs.

Ouch! Not a good idea. I have heard that many things in the outpost can
see invis, I think its because half the NPC's in the outpost are undead and
you would need invis AND invis vs undead at the same time. The Dragoons in
The Overthere are apart of the outpost faction, just con them or you can con
the Cliff Golem, or the Gargoyles, they will all tell you your standing with
the outpost without having to try to sneak inside.

Orcen
Cazic-Thule
